name: pierstoval/character-manager
description: Skeleton of a character manager for games

suggest.doctrine/doctrine-bundle: To inject the object manager in steps and map your Character entities with the ORM
suggest.doctrine/orm: To inject the object manager in steps and map your Character entities with the ORM
suggest.symfony/translation: To translate the messages instead of using the default keys
suggest.symfony/twig-bundle: To use Twig templating engine in your actions
